steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"di25o","text":"Add purified LRRK2RCKW and unpolymerized bovine tubulin dimer in a 2:1 molar ratio into the polymerization buffer (2 LRRK2RCKWs for each tubulin dimer). (Recommended total size:  ) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":18,"length":4},{"style":"sup","offset":122,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":178,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"akv1b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ctk6n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du62g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ijca","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"F55928C0252911EB82B49FFAD3BF1A58","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":52}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":0,"style":"bold"},{"length":4,"offset":28,"style":"sup"}],"key":"eenut","text":"Note: Concentration of LRRK2RCKW has to be at least   to see filaments occur. Has been tested with multiple variants.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":67},{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":83}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":74,"style":"sup"}],"key":"8v5i9","text":"For Snead, Matyszewski, Dickey et al, all filaments were formed at   LRRK2RCKW and   tubulin dimer.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"concentration":"2.5","guid":"69EAC46025E211EB8E3B0A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":29},"mutability":"","type":"concentration"},"1":{"data":{"concentration":"4.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"8FEB6AC071CC11EC8689F7239597F4A7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29},"mutability":"","type":"concentration"},"2":{"data":{"concentration":"2.25","error_concentration":false,"guid":"A5AD7C4071CC11EC8689F7239597F4A7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29},"mutability":"","type":"concentration"}}}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":62}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":0,"style":"bold"},{"length":4,"offset":104,"style":"sup"}],"key":"bps6l","text":"Note: NaCl concentration at this step should remain at around   or less, often imposing a limit on LRRK2RCKW concentration allowed to be used. Higher salt concentration will prevent or reduce filament formation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"concentration":"90","guid":"6EC3EA1325E211EB8E3B0A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":28},"mutability":"","type":"concentration"}}}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df9pi","text":"Recommended grids to use: Lacey Carbon on copper, 300 mesh, made by EMS. Glow discharged right before plunge freezing for    at 20 mA current.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":128,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":122,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cfpmt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":45,"guid":"A3E19AB073E111ECAF1BD5D1C7D9450F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7l387","text":"Dilute the sample 3-fold in the LRRK2 reaction buffer. (Recommended mixture:   +  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":77,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"88ido","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du26b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3djo2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"68A3D180252B11EB82B49FFAD3BF1A58","id":0,"label":"sample","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"8","guid":"77849090252B11EB82B49FFAD3BF1A58","id":0,"label":"LRRK2 buffer","unit":1}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1dh4j","text":"This step reduces glycerol to be within acceptable levels for cryo-EM.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1t68m","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":85,"style":"sup"}],"key":"6t5fj","text":"This will reduce the effective concentration of components, but the dilution of LRRK2RCKW and tubulin might be non-linear due to filaments bundling to each other. The minimum concentration mentioned in Step 1 only applies to incubation step.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"au501","text":"Apply diluted sample to grid and plunge freeze using your usual Vitrobot settings. (Ex.  , blotted for   at blot force 20 for our particular Vitrobot (FEI); conditions might vary from one machine to another).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":88,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":103,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"C964A5D0252B11EB82B49FFAD3BF1A58","id":0,"label":"sample","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":4,"guid":"D3A9E3C0252B11EB82B49FFAD3BF1A58","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
